meanings.definition: The state or quality of having eyes.
meanings.sent1: Her eyednesses allowed her to see the beauty of the world.
meanings.sent2: The animals' eyednesses varied in color and size.
meanings.sent3: His unique eyednesses made him the best lookout in the village.
meanings.sent4: The artist's eyednesses captured the essence of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The child's wide-eyednesses at the zoo were a joy to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of observing or watching closely.
meanings.sent1: The detective's keen eyednesses caught every detail at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: His eyednesses during the play revealed the twist ending.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful eyednesses at the mouse were comical.
meanings.sent4: Her eyednesses on the painting revealed hidden symbols.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's strict eyednesses kept the students in line.

meanings.definition: The ability to perceive or understand something visually.
meanings.sent1: His artistic eyednesses allowed him to create stunning paintings.
meanings.sent2: The scientist's keen eyednesses helped in discovering new species.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's comedic eyednesses made even the mundane hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her intuitive eyednesses in fashion design were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The photographer's sharp-eyednesses captured the perfect moment.
